meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.7 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.7 has just been released.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.11 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.11 has just been released.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.2 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.2.2 has just been released.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.2 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.2.2 has just been released.

meta.title: Getting started with new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin
meta.summary: The all new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin allows you to setup, package, run, start, stop and redeploy easily with a very little configuration resulting in a less verbose pom.xml.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.1
meta.summary: This new version is a bug fix release that addresses issues reported in Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.1. We also updated Netty to version 4.1.39.Final to fix some CVEs.
